thread.title: BRIEF-Diversicare Qtrly Loss Per Share From Continuing Operations $0.94

title: BRIEF-Diversicare Qtrly Loss Per Share From Continuing Operations $0.94
text: March 1, 2018 / 9:42 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Diversicare Qtrly Loss Per Share From Continuing Operations $0.94 Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Diversicare Healthcare Services Inc : * DIVERSICARE ANNOUNCES 2017 FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 6.9 PERCENT TO $144.4 MILLION * DIVERSICARE HEALTHCARE SERVICES-TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT ENACTED ON DEC 22, 2017 RESULTED IN A NON-CASH INCOME TAX EXPENSE OF $5.5 MILLION IN Q4 OF 2017 * EFFECTIVE MARCH 2, 2018, BOARD OF DIRECTORS INCREASED SIZE OF BOARD FROM SEVEN TO EIGHT DIRECTORS * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $0.94 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
